original_title: อั้งยี่ ลูกผู้ชายพันธุ์มังกร
overview: Set in Bangkok's Chinatown in the 1940's this film is about two secret society's that hate each other. Ang Yee is a senior member of one of them. He is also a trained martial arts expert and in a show at a Chinese temple during a festival, real swords are used between both gangs shocking the audience that runs away as fast as they can.
title: Ang-Yee
